title: The Metaphysics of Aristotle
description: The crew spends a few minutes discussing the metaphysical system of Aristotle, one of philosophy’s greatest minds. Participants: Bob LaRocca, Camden Bucey, Jared Oliphint, Jonathan Brack
content:encoded:
The crew spends a few minutes discussing the metaphysical system of Aristotle, one of philosophy’s greatest minds.
